CustomField.description: If "Visual Type" is "Abbreviation" or "Combo", the API name of the field on the hierarchy object that will contribute its value to creating initials in the hierarchy tile avatar.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If "Visual Type" is "Abbreviation" or "Combo", the API name of the field on the hierarchy object that will contribute its value to creating initials in the hierarchy tile avatar.
CustomField.label: Abbreviation Field
